thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: L Donohoe
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by L Donohoe

author: L Donohoe
title: L Donohoe
text: Excellent service. I ordered 2 items online which were delivered to store the next day. Due to online stock checking,one item was unavailable but I got a phone to apologise & a 10% discount on my next shop. The money was back in my account within 2 days. Really great customer service. Would recommend to friends and family.
